comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17931?focusedCommentId=17616641) by Weston Pace (westonpace):*
This was resolved as part of ARROW-17687.  I'm not closing it as a duplicate because it was actually a separate issue.  The `has_inspected_` and `has_started_` properties of `MockFragment` should have been atomic.
